name: Svensk Handel (Swedish Trade Federation)
goal: Svensk Handel - The Swedish Trade Federation - represents more than 12 000 Swedish businesses with a total of 22 000 workplaces employing 300 000 professionals within retail and wholesale including import, export, mail order business and e-commerce. Our members comprise the full range of Swedish retail and wholesale; multinational companies active all over the European Union and elsewhere, national retail chains and local SMEs.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
DSM-strategy
- Geo-blocking, digital contracts, data protection/privacy

Single Market Strategy
- Goods package, enforcement package, retail establishment and retail operational restrictions, Service Package

Trade Policy
- TDI-reform och MES, TTIP och FTAs

Circular Economy
- Waste legislation, Chemicals in texiles

Energy
- Winter package

Food supply chain policy
